dietPhases.title: Low-residue diet
items: Avoid seeds, whole grains, nuts, and raw vegetables.
Prefer lean meats, fish, white rice, and plain pasta.
Fruit without peel or seeds (stewed apple/pear).
Hydrate with water, tea, and non-carbonated drinks.

dietPhases.title: Clear liquids
items: Strained broth, water, tea, and clear isotonic drinks.
Clear gelatin and filtered juices without pulp.
Avoid red/purple drinks, milk, and alcohol.

dietPhases.title: Fasting and final prep
items: Confirm arrival time at the hospital.

medCards.title: Medication 16h before
items: Start prep with Plenvu, Moviprep or Citrafleet + Dulcolax.

medCards.title: Medication 10h before
items: Maintain clear liquid diet until medical guidance.

medCards.title: On the exam day
items: Fast until the time indicated by the clinical team.
Bring documents and your medication list.

faqs.question: Can I take my usual medication?
faqs.answer: Follow your doctor's instructions. Some medications may require adjustment.

faqs.question: Can I drink water on the exam day?
faqs.answer: It depends on the indicated time. Always respect the fasting period given.

faqs.question: What if I cannot finish the solution?
faqs.answer: Contact the hospital to receive specific guidance.

faqs.question: How do I know the prep was effective?
faqs.answer: Bowel movements should become clear/yellowish. If unsure, contact the team.
